item.description:
Alright boys, part 2 of this superstar weekend to help everyone master opening and body language kicks in to effect Saturday night, the 18th in New Haven.

To start off this night, the pregame will be taking place at 8:30 PM at:
Nikkita
200 Crown St
New Haven, CT 06510
Here, the sr members of the group will continue helping out our newer guys with opening. This is a nice, chill environment with great food and pretty hired guns (waitresses). Again, come with openers ready and be ready to practice your banter with the girls here before moving on to the main event.

Part of of this night, we'll be moving over at 10 PM to:
Black Bear Saloon.
124 Temple St
New Haven, CT 06510
This is where everyone should be on the top of their game. Saturday night at Black Bear is always full of women in a spot that is easy to talk. No excuses here. There are sets everywhere to work with. If you need help, that's what your wingmen are for.

Ages: 20-30s

Dress Code: Classy, no extreme peacocking (Fuzzy hats, Boas, Dildos on your head *Sam*)

Any questions, just let me know.

Game on Gentlemen
item.name: Nikkita / Black Bear - New Haven - April 18th - Sat Night
